title: Looking for dedicated mid laner for new ranked team Third Eye Sight (TES)
body:
**Mid Laner Needed**

We need a dedicated mid laner. I would prefer you to have mained mid for quite sometime. I don't want you forced into mid to where you are not comfortable. I would also like for you to have a wide variety for champions to play not just a single champ that you are very strong with. I'd like you to have knowledge about the game; ex. Where to ward, when to ward, awareness on whats going on around you.

**Communication**

If this interests you and you feel like you fit one of the roles above, then you may add my in-game name: TES Basenji. After I get you added back, we would play a game or two. I use Skype the most, Teamspeak second, and I barely use Curse, but if needed I may use Curse.
HAPPY GAMING WITH YOU

replies.body:
IGN: Xypher000
Rank: Bronze 
Role desired (one role): MID
top 3 champs in desired lane pool:{{champion:105}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:127}} 
Curse?: yes 
Why you should be on the team: skilled player looking for a team to play with dedicated mature and available 
would you take criticism of your actions following a game?:
Time available (time zone as well): 4pm -12 EST
Would you be willing to work and adapt around a team strategy?: yes
I'd like to join you if possible, I've been a  mid main for most of my league career and have a wide champion pool, I've added you, hope to keep in touch
Yo, I'm interested, lemme give it a shot. I've been needing some more incentive to get better faster and I think being on a team would help me out tons.
